title: Nuclear Walking Battle Tanks
content: It's 202X, where are all the rail-gun equipped walking battle tanks I was promised? What the world needs now, more than ever, is some good old fashioned deterrence.

title: Keys to open doors
content: Someone once told me to use keys to open doors, that guidance was as helpful as "It's dangerous to go alone..." yada yada yada, eternal battle between light and dark

title: How do I know when I'm satisfied?

content: I've been having these weird dreams lately, like is any of it real || !
